body_html:
@zhao181 I think this link will be helpful to you https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#why-is-caffe2-not-working-as-expected-in-anaconda .

Installing Caffe2 with conda will install Caffe2 into a conda environment so that Caffe2 is available in python, but will not change your current directory. What is the directory "xx/caffe2" ? Are you running into an error? If so please provide the full error message.
body_text:
@zhao181 I think this link will be helpful to you https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#why-is-caffe2-not-working-as-expected-in-anaconda .
Installing Caffe2 with conda will install Caffe2 into a conda environment so that Caffe2 is available in python, but will not change your current directory. What is the directory "xx/caffe2" ? Are you running into an error? If so please provide the full error message.
body:
@zhao181 I think this link will be helpful to you https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#why-is-caffe2-not-working-as-expected-in-anaconda . 

Installing Caffe2 with conda will install Caffe2 into a conda environment so that Caffe2 is available in python, but will not change your current directory. What is the directory "xx/caffe2" ? Are you running into an error? If so please provide the full error message.
